fields.name: PFP ID:
fields.value: Eldertubby Po, the Sovereign, wearing a GVS Elipse P-100 elastomeric mask for personal safety, and to be a good community member during an airborne pandemic

fields.name: Banner ID:
fields.value: The Mild Mild West, a mural by Banksy, sited on No. 80 Stokes Croft, Bristol. It depicts a teddy bear throwing a Molotov cocktail at three riot police
